summary: A pair of slackers get in way over their heads when they try to dump the body of a dead girlfriend in the basement of a drive-in movie theater where a satanic cult performs ritual sacrifices.
cast: Scott Speedman|Wes Bentley|Taryn Manning|Matt Frewer|Greg Bryk|Maggie Castle|Raoul Bhaneja|Joe Dinicol|Jordan Prentice|Dax Ravina|Elizabeth Lennie|James McQuade|Shayne Wyler|Joe Silvaggio|Allan Redford|Mark Parr|Stephen Jackson|Derek Gilroy|Randy Butcher
title: Weirdsville
